cloudcommunity /

      Free-Certifications---A curated list of free courses & certifications.

apple /

      swift-testing---A modern, expressive testing package for Swift

apple /

      axlearn---An Extensible Deep Learning Library

codecrafters-io /

      build-your-own-x---Master programming by recreating your favorite technologies from scratch.

coollabsio /

      coolify---An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify / Vercel alternative.

karpathy /

      nanoGPT---The simplest, fastest repository for training/finetuning medium-sized GPTs.

xenova /

      transformers.js---State-of-the-art Machine Learning for the web. Run 🤗 Transformers directly in your browser, with no need for a server!

      litestar---Production-ready, Light, Flexible and Extensible ASGI API framework | Effortlessly Build Performant APIs

      TTS---🐸💬 - a deep learning toolkit for Text-to-Speech, battle-tested in research and production

      manim---Animation engine for explanatory math videos

juspay /

      hyperswitch---An open source payments switch written in Rust to make payments fast, reliable and affordable

dortania /

      OpenCore-Legacy-Patcher---Experience macOS just like before

      Avalonia---Develop Desktop, Embedded, Mobile and WebAssembly apps with C# and XAML. The most popular .NET UI client technology
